Package me.vivian.displayer

Class ItemManipulation

java.lang.Object
me.vivian.displayer.ItemManipulation
public class ItemManipulation extends Object
Provides utility methods for manipulating inventory items.

  • Method Details

    • isSlotOOB

      public boolean isSlotOOB(Integer index, Integer invSize)
      Checks if a slot (index) is out of bounds for the given (inventory size).
      Parameters:
      index - The slot index to check.
      invSize - The size of the inventory.
      Returns:
      True if the slot index is out of bounds, otherwise false.

    • setInventoryItemXY

      public void setInventoryItemXY(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStack, Integer X, Integer Y)
      Sets a specific slot (X, Y) of the given (inventory) to (itemStack).
      Parameters:
      inventory - The target inventory.
      itemStack - The item to set.
      X - The X coordinate of the slot.
      Y - The Y coordinate of the slot.

    • getInventoryItemXY

      public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getInventoryItemXY(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory, Integer X, Integer Y)
      gets the item from slot (X, Y) of the given (inventory).
      Parameters:
      inventory - The target inventory.
      X - The X coordinate of the slot.
      Y - The Y coordinate of the slot.
      Returns:
      The ItemStack in the specified slot or null if out of bounds.

    • itemWithName

      public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemWithName(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStack, String name)
      Sets the display (name) of an (itemStack).
      Parameters:
      itemStack - The ItemStack to modify.
      name - The new display name.
      Returns:
      The modified ItemStack.
